name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lamborghini Centenario: Power and Style in a Live Theme

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Feel the power of the Lamborghini Centenario with dynamic visuals and quick access shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience the elegance and power of the Lamborghini Centenario in this dynamic theme featuring sleek design and quick shortcuts.

Dynamic Live Wallpaper: Immerse yourself in the stunning visuals of the Lamborghini Centenario, showcasing its iconic design and cutting-edge aesthetics.
Minimalist Design: A clean and modern interface inspired by the sleek lines of the Centenario.
Clock and Date: Keep track of time and date at a glance while enjoying the supercar's elegance.
Quick Access Shortcuts: Instantly navigate to your favorite websites with effortless speed.
Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with the engine selected by the user.
More Extension: Add unique features to elevate your browsing experience with a luxurious touch.
